```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(xkcd)
```

```{r xkcdaxis, cache = TRUE}
xrange <- range(mtcars$mpg)
yrange <- range(mtcars$wt)
p <- ggplot() +
     geom_point(aes(mpg, wt), data=mtcars) +
     xkcdaxis(xrange,yrange)
p



```
